wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Richard Phineas Riall (born 1960) is the chief executive officer (CEO) of Priory Group since April 2013.

response: Benyon married Elizabeth Hallifax in 1957. They had two sons, three daughters and 18 grandchildren, who all survived him. His elder son, Richard Benyon, was the Conservative MP for Newbury from 2005 to 2019. His daughter, Mary, wife of Tom Riall, was appointed High Sheriff of Berkshire in April 2020.
